doc.title: Parmakliklar arkasinda
doc.plot: Ali and Gul are factory workers and they want to get married. Their boss's nephew Turgut fancies Gul. Turgut is a gambler and has huge amounts of gambling debts. As his uncle doesn't give him money anymore, he wants to rob the factory. He makes up a story and invites Ali to the factory. The guard of the factory gets shot. Before dying the man tells the police that he had seen Ali in the factory, so Ali gets arrested. Ali escapes from jail, he meets Turgut's girl friend Jale. Turgut kidnaps Gul, but Jale tells their place, so Ali saves Gul. Gul and Ali inform the police, Turgut gets caught. A splendid future awaits the young couple.
